description:
Asuta and Renge are on the run after being separated from Kate and Itsuka. The other members of Zvezda have been captured and West Udogawa has been annexed by Tokyo. Asuta has to make a decision about what to do next.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: All That Remains of Conqueror`s Dreams
Les conquérants ne sont plus qu`un rêve
征服者どもが夢のあと
